WRITING.TEXT: very cute skirt and boots! Everything looks great, except maybe tights/leggings with the high boots? Thats just imo though, to me high boots and bare legs don't go.
thank you! that was exactly the kind of advice I was looking for, thank you for being so thorough!

WRITING.TITLE: Another clueless 20something interviewer
WRITING.TEXT:
I have an interview for the position of veterinary assistant...everyone there wears scrubs. This is my 2nd interview with them, I managed to scrounge a semi-acceptable dress and cardigan for the 1st, but have no idea what to wear for the 2nd. This (http://imgur.com/LeEST and http://imgur.com/Pmfcr) is what I came up with for the 2nd one. It's not particularly flattering, but does it work at all? Thank you gals and guys in advance!
edit: title should technically be interviewee. Sorry, my bad.
nooo not off the resume, I meant off the internet. keep them on the resume, that's important
you might wanna take your contact info off...

Looks amazing!!
Where did you buy it though?

...i thought for a second you wrote thomas hunt morgan, and got really excited.
kudos, sick tattoo!!!

WRITING.TITLE: Third year college biology class: Exactly how to tell which of the progeny are recombinats in a dihybrid cross?
WRITING.TEXT:
Given a cross of AaBb x aabb
Progeny: 45 are AB 12 are Ab 8 are aB 52 are ab
What exactly makes them a recombination? Ab and aB are the recombinates according to the answer key, but why isn't AB? Other than the fact that recombination frequency maxs out at 50%.
Thanks in advance!
the good people of r/bdsm welcome you.
i've had this as long as I can remember

WRITING.TITLE: Cracked, peeling feet?
WRITING.TEXT: The soles of my feet are thick and dry, cracking and peeling. My damn skin comes off in thick sheets. I've tried creams, vasaline, weird callus shavers, but nothing really works and it's always back within a few days. It's really rather ugly and sometimes the sticking out skin gets caught on socks...What to do? Any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks in advance!

...i had a piano in my dorm room...
ok fine it was a keyboard but it was a fucking big keyboard
